customer_addr:
4506 Del Prado Blvd S Suite A
Cape Coral, FL 33904

citations.narrative:
There is a Capuchin non human primate on exhibit and sugar gliders on exhibit and or for sale at this Pet Shop
without a USDA license. A licenseing packet in the name of Gina Diaz was sent to this Pet Shop in June 2015.
Any person operating or intending to operate as a Exhibitor / Dealer must obtain a USDA license. A person seeking
a license shall apply on a form which will be furnished by the AC Regional Director in the State in which that person
operates or intends to operate.
UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED, NO REGULATED ACTIVITY CAN BE CONDUCTED.
This inspection and exiti interview was conducted with the care taker.

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)
REQUIREMENTS AND APPLICATION.
There is a Capuchin non human primate on exhibit and sugar gliders on exhibit and or for sale at this Pet Shop
without a USDA license.  A licenseing packet in the name of Gina Diaz was sent to this Pet Shop in June 2015.  
Any person operating or intending to operate as a Exhibitor / Dealer must obtain a USDA license.  A person seeking
a license shall apply on a form which will be furnished by the AC Regional Director in the State in which that person
operates or intends to operate. 
              UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED, NO REGULATED ACTIVITY CAN BE CONDUCTED.
This inspection and exiti interview was conducted with the care taker.
